AirWobbling.NAME: Air Wobbling
AirWobbling.FLAVOR: Falcon wobbles you into a Rest.
DESCRIPTIONS: Your #yAerial cards that add #yCombo-Points add one additional #yCombo-Point.

AutoLCanceling.NAME: Auto L Canceling
AutoLCanceling.FLAVOR: Everyone misses them, sometimes it's nice to turn it on.
DESCRIPTIONS: After using an #yAerial, reduce the cost of your next card by 1 [E] if it's a non-Aerial.

BMoveUser.NAME: B Move User
BMoveUser.FLAVOR: Raptor Boost is lame in Neutral.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply #yBurn, apply an additional 1 #yBurn. #yBurn does one additional damage per stack.

EvidenceZip.NAME: Evidence.zip
DESCRIPTIONS: Enemies in regular combat rooms have 20% less HP.

FourStock.NAME: Four Stock
FourStock.FLAVOR: I suppose this relic is more like a JV 5, but this works.
DESCRIPTIONS: When a battle is finished without taking damage, #yUpgrade a card.

JohnnyStock.NAME: Johnny Stock
JohnnyStock.FLAVOR: When he's on his last stock is when he comes alive.
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have 20% or less of your max health, gain 5 #yStrength and ALL Attacks cards add an additional #yCombo-point and cost 1 less [E] .

LosersMang0.NAME: Losers Mang0
LosersMang0.FLAVOR: Still weaker than Mother's Day Mang0
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, gain +4 Strength and +4 Dexterity.

Marthritis.NAME: Marthritis
DESCRIPTIONS: Double the #yPercent you apply to enemies.

NoKnee.NAME: No Knee
DESCRIPTIONS: When a #yFinisher is used on a target that has #yCombo-points, gain 2 Strength.

NonNeutralStart.NAME: Non-neutral Start
NonNeutralStart.FLAVOR: No port combination is perfect for all legal stages, just mod it in or agree to it.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, apply 15 Percent to ALL enemies

PeoplesChamp.NAME: People's Champ
PeoplesChamp.FLAVOR: I lost to Scarth in bracket at The Big House 6, my shame is immeasurable.
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 6 turns, add a Commentator Curse that can change the intent of the target to your hand.

PowerClipper.NAME: Power Clipper
DESCRIPTIONS: Every 10 turns, replay the cards you played this turn.

TeamBeerMang0.NAME: Team Beer Mang0
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each combat, add a Mang0 Fox and Falco to your hand. If you die and resurrect, this effect changes.

YearsOfResearch.NAME: Years of Research
YearsOfResearch.FLAVOR: Some of the most hilarious drama Melee has ever seen.
DESCRIPTIONS: Draw a card when this relic is right-clicked, this can be done 3 times per combat.
